machine_start_gcode.default_value:
; ** FlashForge Creator Pro Start Gcode by Toylerrr **
M73 P0 ; Turn on build progress
G130 X127 Y127 Z40 A127 B127 ; Reset stepper reference voltage
G162 X Y F3600 ; 
Home X and Y axes
G161 Z F1200 ; Home Z axis
; Z axis calibration
G92 Z-5 ; Set Z to -5
G1 Z0 ; Move Z to 0
G161 Z F100 ; Home Z slowly
; End Z axis calibration
M132 
 Y Z A B ; Load home offset values
M135 T0 ; Load right extruder offset value
 G1 X150 Y-70 Z30 F9000 ; Move carriage to waiting position
M73 P1 ; @body (For converting from gcode to binary)

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
; ** FlashForge Creator Pro End Gcode by Toylerrr **
M73 P100 ; Turn off build progress
M140 S0 ; Stop heating bed
M104 S0 T0 ; Stop heating right extruder
M104 S0 T1 ; 
top heating left extruder
G1 Z145 F1200 ; Completely lower build plate
T0 ; Tell next job to use right extruder
G28 X Y F2500 ; Home X and Y axes
M18 ; Disable steppers
M70 P5 (Finished)
M72 P1 ; Play print complete song if sound is enabled
